message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8000?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to get the product at a price closer to your valuation. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $8500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $8200. I believe this is a fair compromise given the quality and utility of the product.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can offer it to you for $8500 was too low, so I'm going to try a compromise in the middle of my original offer and your latest offer. I can offer it to you for $8250. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
